units.title: Passaging hiPS cells before lentiviral infection
units.text: CAG::Cas9;Dlxi1/2::eGFP hiPS cells were passaged with accutase 1 day before infection with the lentiviral library (with 5 µg ml−1 polybrene).
units.rationale: Describes the cell preparation step required prior to transduction with the lentiviral library.
